profileText: A Representative from Florida; born in Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio, April 20, 1976; graduated from Elder High School, Cincinnati, Ohio, 1994; B.A., Loyola University, Chicago, Ill., 1999; journalist; television anchor; radio talk show host; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress until his resignation on January 27, 2014 (January 3, 2013-January 27, 2014).

creativeWork.freeFormCitationText: Radel, Trey. Democrazy: A True Story of Weird Politics, Money, Madness, and Finger Food. New York: Blue Rider Press, 2017.
